alert.note: Alert for Archer; Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 5:25PM CDT until October 04 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clay County in northern Texas... Southeastern Archer County in northern Texas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 525 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jolly to 4 miles east of Scotland to 7 miles southeast of Archer City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henrietta, Scotland, Windthorst, Bellevue, Jolly, Lake Arrowhead, Bluegrove, Newport, Joy, Vashti, and Shannon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
